group_1.textCenter: From now on, this Azalea House will be@your home.

group_1.narration: The director has already passed away...@So, this must be a dream...
I, who was despised by my parents,@was left all alone when they died.
Hazuki, whose parents died in an accident,@was passed around from one relative to another@and bore all the unpleasant things with a forced smile.
Ayame, who was abandoned@and can't even remember her parents' faces...
As orphans,@we were warmly welcomed by everyone at@the orphanage known as the "Azalea House"@and the director, who treated us like family.
...We lived blissful lives,@until some unknown authority or corporation@decided to tear down the Azalea House.
The director died of heartache...@and the only way the three of us could@save the Azalea House was to@become Magical Girls...
We were no longer ordinary people,@so we decided to erase everyone's memories of us,@leave the Azalea House,@and survive on our own.
We've been unreasonably pushed around@by our circumstances,@and we had lost everything important to us,@so we've been living our lives@while trusting only each other.

But when we met other Magical Girls@who bore the same fate as us,@we began to think that maybe,@there were others we could trust...@Little by little, we began to get involved@with the people around us.

group_1.textRight: I'm hooome!
Ah, hold on, Ayame...!

group_1.textLeft: Same to you, Hazuki. If you were back,@you should have said something...

group_1.textRight: I didn't want to be rude by waking you.
Besides, I was just dropping by real quick@before my next errand.
Huh?! You're goin' out again?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, I'm just gathering a little bit of intel.

group_1.textRight: Whaddabout dinner?!

group_1.textLeft: There's still some time left until dinner, right?

group_1.textRight: But, but, I came home 'cuz I was staaaarvin'...

group_1.textLeft: If Hazuki's busy, I'll prepare dinner.

group_1.textRight: Bleh...
In that case, we'll have takeout tonight.
On top of that, you're tired, Konoha.@You don't have to force yourself to cook.
Really...?
Then let me help you next time, okay?
It's not easy to figure out what's going on in@Kamihama all by yourself.

group_1.textLeft: ...It seems I can't keep things hidden from you...

group_1.textRight: Well...pretty much.
Hm? Whatcha talkin' about?
Oh... Kako messaged me.
...CRUD!
I forgot to return the book she lent me!
I'll be back in a bit!
Well then, I'm heading out too.
Take it easy, Konoha.@We're gonna order takeout tonight, all right?
And don't do too much investigating!
Okay, I'm off!

group_1.textCenter: (I kept the investigation a secret,@but Hazuki saw right through me...)

group_1.narration: A system that prevents Magical Girls@from transforming into Witches,@the "Automatic Purification System,"@has emerged in Kamihama.@The situation is becoming one where Magical Girls@may launch an attack anywhere, anytime...
I've been covertly investigating the Magical Girls from@elsewhere to dispel my ominous premonition, but@I haven't found any useful information.@Hazuki's right, perhaps it's time...
...Ayame has made friends@as she's become more involved with her surroundings,@and Hazuki and I both know that@there are some Magical Girls who we can trust.
But what we need to prioritize is...

group_1.textCenter: (...protecting each other.@The three of us must survive together...)
(...No matter what happens in the future,@no matter who else we lose...)
(I won't hesitate...to protect Hazuki and Ayame...!)
